SEARCH
Package ardat.tree

Class DirectoryEntity

java.lang.Object
ardat.tree.ArchiveEntity
ardat.tree.DirectoryEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class DirectoryEntity extends ArchiveEntity
DirectoryEntity is a concrete implementation of ArchiveEntity, that supports children related methods. DirectoryEntity is a Composite participant of the Composite pattern.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    DirectoryEntity(String name, ArchiveEntityProperty[] properties)
    Construct a DirectoryEntity object given the local name of the directory and associated properties

    • getName

      public String[] getName()
      Description copied from class: ArchiveEntity
      Returns the unique name of the current entity in the tree organized in an array. The array is composed of non-unique entity names represented as strings. The index represents the depth of each entity where the 0th index is the root of the tree.
      Specified by:
      getName in class ArchiveEntity
      Returns:
      the unique name of the current entity in the tree

    • isLeaf

      public boolean isLeaf()
      Description copied from class: ArchiveEntity
      Returns true if the entity doesn't support adding and removing children.
      Overrides:
      isLeaf in class ArchiveEntity
      Returns:
      true if the entity doesn't support children related methods, otherwise returns false
